page.title: 14Hobbies in Newburgh
page.content: Many people particularly children have hobbies which they do in their spare time.One of the most popular hobbies amongst children is collecting small objects such as stamps,postcards and foreign coins.They usually get them when they are on holiday.If they collect stamps they can join stamp clubs and receive lots of other stamps. These days most children in this area play computer games in their spare time.There is a wide variety of computer games to play.Some of the games educate the children as well as entertaining them. Most adults,whether they are parents or not,do not usually have a lot of spare time.When they do,they usually read books or newspapers.They also watch The News, Golf and other Sporting programmes in the evening.
